topic.title: Some of the elements in HTML

shortdesc.p: An HTML element usually consists of a start tag and an end tag, with the content inserted in between

shortdesc.p: A schema language describes the structure of an XML document The XML schema language is also referred to as XML Schema Definition (XSD)

topic.title: How to create a schema language in Oxygen

shortdesc.p: An XML Schema describes the structure of an XML document. The XML Schema language is also referred to as XML Schema Definition (XSD). Here we describe the steps you need to take to create an XSD for your XML document.

topicmeta.navtitle: How to create a schema language in Oxygen
